General.Name: London & Associated Properties
General.Description: London & Associated Properties is a fully listed property investment company specialising in retail. It owns a portfolio of shopping centres and other retail property currently worth some £78m. LAP also invests in joint ventures with institutional co-owners; these have included Oaktree Capital Management, Schroders and Bank of Scotland. LAMS, LAP's directly owned subsidiary, is an property asset manager that carries out both asset management and property management for third parties. These parties have included the Lloyds Bank, NAMA, Deloittes and Grant Thornton as well as the joint ventures in which LAP has invested. LAP also has a 41.5% interest in Bisichi Mining Plc, a fully listed mining company. Bisichi owns a retail property portfolio that is also managed by LAP.
General.Address: 24 Bruton Place, London, United Kingdom, W1J 6NE
